meanings.definition: A substance made from the latex of the rubber tree, used for making tires, hoses, and other products.
meanings.sent1: I bounced the rubber ball on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The rubber band snapped when stretched too far.
meanings.sent3: The rubber duck in the bathtub quacked at me!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as flexible as rubber, always bouncing back.
meanings.sent5: The smell of burning rubber filled the air at the racetrack.

meanings.sent1: I used the rubber to erase my mistake on the paper.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out rubber erasers before the test.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student pretended the rubber was a tiny car.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a rubber, wiping away the errors of the past.
meanings.sent5: The artist gently rubbed the rubber against the pencil marks.

meanings.definition: A person who rubs or massages.
meanings.sent1: The rubber at the spa gave me a relaxing massage.
meanings.sent2: The professional rubber worked out the knots in my shoulders.
meanings.sent3: The rubber's hands were like magic, easing away the tension.
meanings.sent4: She was a rubber of stress, soothing away worries with her touch.
meanings.sent5: The rubber's touch was gentle yet firm, melting away the tension.
